tool_description: API for detecting labels that describes image
title: Image Labels

api_list.name: Labels of uploaded image
api_list.description: Detect labels from more than 10k categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-labels.p.rapidapi.com/lab/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-labels.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
